    java.lang.Cloneable
    @Deprecated
public class WoodenStep
extends Wood
    Deprecated.
    all usage of MaterialData is deprecated and subject to removal. Use BlockData.
    Represents the different types of wooden steps.
    See Also:
    Material.LEGACY_WOOD_STEP
